HERO.TITLE: Software Developer
HERO.BIO: Developer specialized in integrating AI into enterprise back-end systems. I love cats, drawing, and technology.

DESCRIPTIONS.EXP_1: Developed and integrated AI models for detecting and classifying behavioral patterns in complex environments into a web system focused on providing ready-to-use AI models for various scientific research laboratories.
DESCRIPTIONS.EXP_2: In a partnership between Instituto Metrópole Digital (IMD) and Riachuelo Group, I worked on developing a sophisticated real-time fault detection system using AI and computer vision, applying cutting-edge technologies to the field of industrial automation in the textile sector.
DESCRIPTIONS.EXP_3: In a partnership between Instituto Metrópole Digital (IMD) and DELL Technologies, I rebuilt critical applications for Dell's operations, focusing on performance and security for internal processes of development teams across multiple countries.

HIGHLIGHTS.EXP_1_H1: Worked in a multidisciplinary team focused on scientific research and development.
HIGHLIGHTS.EXP_1_H2: Served as the bridge between scientists and developers.
HIGHLIGHTS.EXP_1_H3: Worked with state-of-the-art technologies in the field of computing.
HIGHLIGHTS.EXP_2_H1: Automated fault detection processes with high accuracy.
HIGHLIGHTS.EXP_2_H2: Increased worker productivity through automated systems.

DESCRIPTIONS.PROJ_1: A command-line tool written in Rust for data analysis and recovery, specialized in images even after formatting. Currently supports Linux only.
DESCRIPTIONS.PROJ_2: Chatbot specialized in paint recommendations and generating simulation images of house painting using Google AI.
DESCRIPTIONS.PROJ_3: Parking lot management system with ESP32 and AI for vehicle license plate detection.

INSTITUTIONS.FEDERAL_UNIVERSITY: Federal University of Rio Grande do Norte

DESCRIPTIONS.EDU_1: Graduate program where I learned the fundamentals of computing and software development. Focus on data structures, algorithms, networks, and object-oriented programming. Covered advanced topics such as machine learning, concurrent programming, and IoT.
DESCRIPTIONS.EDU_2: Graduate program where I deepened my knowledge in Computer Science. Focus on advanced programming concepts, complex algorithms, compilers, machine learning, and real-time processing.

HIGHLIGHTS.EDU_1_H1: Extension projects in AI and computer vision applied to Back-end.
HIGHLIGHTS.EDU_1_H2: Undergraduate research in AI for behavioral pattern recognition.
HIGHLIGHTS.EDU_2_H1: Extension projects in AI applied to Back-end for natural language processing.
HIGHLIGHTS.EDU_2_H2: Extension projects in AI and real-time image processing.
